tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: i am a police officer. I was travelling in bike suddenly bike got punctured and then i parked my vehicle to see . In a fraction of second like a night mare . One vehicle hit me hard. I could not bear the pain . i was diagnosed with some malunited fracture and stiffness of elbow. I was stunned. I managed to go back home and then i went to my native person   they applied slab but unfortunately it dint work for me . And i came to Dr Ram Chidambaram with one of my senior officer . he explained my problem in detail. he tole me he will do metal work removal and arthrolysis of elbow. He spoke to him and today my hand is all fine i am able to move my hand freely . I am very much relaxed my hand movement is very good i had lost all my hopes of getting back to normal. Sometimes like a blessing we get people like Dr Ram Chidambaram  who gave back my life now i am only given fit for light duties hopefully i start my work back.Thanks to the Miot Hopsital and Dr Ram Chidambaram for both Moral support and Treatment. I like him because he sees us like a human being and not just like patient he spends time for us . Make some jokes . Make my mind free . and then tell me the problem and treatment. He is a great man and a great doctor too thanks doctor Ram  . ....!!!!!!!!!!!! i want to move my hand 100 %

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
He sees to be a Super good surgeon . I am quite satisfied with the treatment procedure normally in north the treatment is sick same applied to me. I had a latarjet failure. I came to ram chidambaram He did latarjet revision i am doing very well. 
Once i was helping a kid and accidentally fell down i am also from Hospital industry i know the pros and cons I choosed DR Ram i am doing great today 
100 thanks to u ... very fine treatment,
bahut acha laga hamko ...mae bahut kush hooo .. je shukriyaaa apko

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I got giddiness and fell down on the road consulted Dr Ramchidambaram . He said he will do the procedure called Shoulder arthrosciopy, Arthroscopic Subacromial and ACJ Decompression Rotator Cuff repair . I took all the reports and went to m Family physician He told I can go ahead for the surgery also I got fully confident talking to the hief doctor . I underwent surgery,. I did pre op fitness ECG /echo /chest xray then I did surgery and today I am v happy  don't have much of ain I can do exercise freely I am very very happy . I can drive long . I have no problem . Thankyou doctor thankyou vv much. I wil never forget ur favour.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: myself dasarathan a born hard worker . I had lot to do i am the only bread winner. I climbed up the tree and fell down accidentally . I ca,e to MOT International met Dr Ram Chidamabram he told u have to undergo radial head replacement . I underwent the surgery Now i am doing great all thanks to the Doctor . Now I started my Work Earlier i had to rest for quite some time . But Now i am a proud bread winner of my House . I am extremely happy with the service I can eat , do all my daily routine activities all thanks to him

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I have a different story i underwent wrist surgery being n IT i get no good time for medical procedure as my bread n butter was work .  i ignored my hand problem and came all way to dr ram chidambaram with terrible pain . I was helpless i was in tears speaking to him . He told me he would release the tendons and put an implant .i got trust in him and underwent surgery now i feel much better .I dont see any problem i am v much relieved thankyou dr thanks a lot . Will not forget u for ever . I WISH MIOT ALL THE BEST . Happy new year in advance .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
A great place **  ******* ********* blessed with miot thanks a lot 
Dr dhillon and dr ram chidambaram mind blowing doctors . Great treatment and service .i am very much happy care is very good personally doctors will see what is needed a great place .
I came with 3 injuries i suffered a lot . I fell from tree when i was 27 now i am 57 i am much better now i have no much difficulty i run a poultry farm going well . I TAKE CARE COMPELTELY . Thanks doctors for helping us get normal will never forget the help .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was writing home work my mom called me I just got up from the diwana My leg was stuck to my school bag and I fell down . Doctors old it was fracture we were very much shocked . Later Doctors told me I had lessvitamin D due to which I suffered DISPLACED COMMINUTED SUPRCONDYLAR INTERCONDYLAR FRACTURE . I underwent surgery I am recommended with some exercisesi am on regular practise now I started doing my school home work . Now I am happ I am doing my basic work I am not dat tensed like before . I am going to school happily . :) :) :) Thanks Dr Ram Chidambaram uncle  very helpful treatment You are the best

tags: None
review: Amiable and friendly to patients. Excellent diagnosis, prompt action. Makes patients feel free to discuss problems. His nature emits warmth and positive vibes. Judicious checking of reports and excellent explanation of the health issues to patients. Awesome communication skills and a patient listener.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I met with an bike accident last 3 months so my hand elbow is fracture with dislocated, thumb fracture both are severely injured he suggested must do the surgery because of complicated fractures then he done the surgery now it's fine I feel very right person choosed now I can easily elbow movement is normal little pain but better improvement.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: My mom is  open joint injury in left elbow and lateral and medial collateral ligament injury in past 5 months. I will meet at Dr. Ram Chidambaram sir the treatment is good and my mom is really happy...sir advice is mostly useful for my mom.. My mom is come back to day to day life.. So I'm happy....  Lot of Thank you sir....

review: I climbed in a stool to collect the file and fell I had severe elbow fracture I had severe swelling with broken bones I underwent surgery with Dr ram chidambaram he did the surgery for me on last December 2008, I came for continuous review and den post 1 year I did plate removal I am able to stretch my hand well.  I can do 100 percent house hold work.   I ride my two wheeler. I have to do more exercise and work on it.  Tahnkyou Dr ram chidambaram.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Few years ago my uncle underwent a surgery at Miot one of my known person had actually referred dr Ram Chidambaram we walked in felt very good . As he is a sports person he wanted to get back to sports . We are very glad now he is doing extremely well we taught he would stop playing but now he is all fine enjoying his game m Recently I came for review felt very glad .Thanks to Dr Ram I think he is  most recommended surgeon for hand I don't have to tell much it's well known to everybody

I am very happy now i had great treatment. Now i can do all moments my hand is free i am enjoying well . 100 thanks to dr ram chidambaram

review:
Let me share medical history 
On 29 Oct I fell on the road and suffered bad injury got so restless couldn't ntg seeked for help and walked into miot Dr ram a great surgeon in the universe took all efforts and cured me fine . I went down  I shouted left and right on everyone but someone he made my hand all fine I never dreamt to get my hand back all thanks to u doctor may God bless u with God health long life prosperity and peace valzhga valamudan.

review:
i underwent Reverse shoulder  replacement.
1 year 3 months before i fell from bike .  MY HAND WAS GONE. i SUFFERED A LOT WITH PAIN.I faced severe injury . Post that i visited Miot Interenational Dr Ram chidambaram TREATED me i am all good now i am able to move my hand freely. I have no complaints of hand pain
very thankful to the treatment . I am very happy post surgery i am able to do daily activities i am going to drive 4 wheeler as well. thanks

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
**** *** **** ** *** ***** **** ** ***** ** ******** ******* ** ********* My wife dislocated her right shoulder badly due to successive episodes of seizures. On examining further, her shoulder cup had cracks. We were fearing it'd be replaced by a titanium implant. Thank God! Dr. RC restored the original configuration; reviewed and followed up to guide us through the process in an impeccable manner. We're very, very happy and are thankful to him!

I'll surely recommend the doctor for any shoulder related issues. **** *** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi I met doctor for my arm and shoulder fracture . ** *** *** ** *** **** ***** ** **** ****** . He  was friendly and he distracted me from the pain i was undergoing and made me understand that i will be alright in 4 to 5 weeks by natural healing . He did not exaggarate the issue and made me ubderstand  easy and advised  for no surgery recommended as i was hearing some ilogical advise from other ortho . Over all Dr Ram is  a best ortho practising at MIOT chennai. 

The other was Mr Mahesh Karthik . He is another best ortho tp advise you about the issue and who is sharp in understanding the issue and make yiu feel comfortable.  Thanks Mahesh .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I am a successful kidney transplant patient  and I had a bad right clavicle fracture, met Dr Ram Chidambaram, MIOT Hospital through my Nephrologist Dr Rajan Ravichandran. He explained the surgery procedure in a very simple way and cleared all doubts. A steel plate was inserted in my right shoulder,  he is very friendly during post surgery period, 
Even after 5 years of the surgery I didn't feel any discomfort, feeling better and I can able to rotate my arm in all directions without pain.
I am planning to participate in next year world transplant games in Javelin throw category.

Thanks to the fantastic Surgeon and a wonderful human being. Kudos ...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: i am very happy with the service. My hand is completely fine. I am enjoying my life. I can lift heavy weights all happy. Thankyou v much dr

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My son, a master from Thiruvannamalai was suffering due to Salter Harris type 2 Fracture since January . We went to MIOT International and consulted him. He was a very good doctor. He gave me full confidence and make mentally strong and operated me. After that I was happy with my hand.


Thank You , Dr.Ram Chidambaram and continue your service and my wishes to you to continue your service.
